education.area: Bachelor of Science, Magna Cum Laude

courses.name: Random Processes
courses.summary: Analysis of random phenomena associated with communications, signal processing, and computer engineering applications. Investigation of random binary signals, thermal noise, and Markov processes in communications, data mining, and machine learning. Applications include optimal filtering, estimation theory, Kalman filtering, online filtering, social networking, and queuing theory

courses.name: Communication Systems
courses.summary: Introduction to communication systems: Continuous wave modulation and demodulation. Power efficiency, bandwidth efficiency and system complexity of modulation systems. Performance of Communication systems in noise. Sampling process and various types of pulse modulation, introduction to digital modulation and demodulation, optimal reception in Additive White Gaussian Noise (AWGN), bit error rate (BER) and symbol error rate (SER) evaluation.

courses.name: Advanced Digital Design Using Verilog HDL
courses.summary: Design, develop, synthesis, test, validation &verification digital systems using Verilog HDL and FPGA.

courses.name: VLSI Circuit Design
courses.summary: Integrated circuit chip design in silicon CMOS technology. Computer aided physical layout design and simulation of digital integrated circuits-combinational logic and sequential logic circuits. CMOS Fabrication. Semiconductor memory and array architectures. Optimizing speed, area, power
